object.name: InputTextMessageContent
object.description: Represents the content of a text message to be sent as the result of an inline query.
object.html_description: Represents the content of a text message to be sent as the result of an inline query.
object.rst_description: Represents the `content <https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#inputmessagecontent>`_ of a text message to be sent as the result of an inline query.

annotations.description: Text of the message to be sent, 1-4096 characters
annotations.html_description: Text of the message to be sent, 1-4096 characters
annotations.rst_description: Text of the message to be sent, 1-4096 characters
annotations.name: message_text

annotations.description: Mode for parsing entities in the message text. See formatting options for more details.
annotations.html_description: Optional. Mode for parsing entities in the message text. See formatting options for more details.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Mode for parsing entities in the message text. See `formatting options <https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#formatting-options>`_ for more details.
annotations.name: parse_mode

annotations.description: List of special entities that appear in message text, which can be specified instead of parse_mode
annotations.html_description: Optional. List of special entities that appear in message text, which can be specified instead of parse_mode
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. List of special entities that appear in message text, which can be specified instead of *parse_mode*
annotations.name: entities

annotations.description: Link preview generation options for the message
annotations.html_description: Optional. Link preview generation options for the message
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Link preview generation options for the message
annotations.name: link_preview_options

annotations.description: Disables link previews for links in the sent message
annotations.html_description: Optional. Disables link previews for links in the sent message
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Disables link previews for links in the sent message
annotations.name: disable_web_page_preview
